metadata.title: BMC Infectious Diseases Small islands and pandemic influenza: Potential benefits and limitations of travel volume reduction as a border control measure

abstract.original_text: Background: Some island nations have explicit components of their influenza pandemic plans for providing travel warnings and restricting incoming travellers. But the potential value of such restrictions has not been quantified.

sentences.segment_text: Background : Some island nations have explicit components of their influenza pandemic plans for providing travel warnings and restricting incoming travellers .
But the potential value of such restrictions has not been quantified .

abstract.original_text: We developed a probabilistic model and used parameters from a published model (i.e., InfluSim) and travel data from Pacific Island Countries and Territories (PICTs).

sentences.segment_text: We developed a probabilistic model and used parameters from a published model ( i.e. , InfluSim ) and travel data from Pacific Island Countries and Territories ( PICTs ) .
